CustomField.description: Previously was: Annual_HOA_Fee__c + Annual_Insurance__c + Annual_Managment_Fee__c + Annual_Taxes__c + Vacancy_Repairs__c + Maintenance_Repairs__c
CustomField.formula: Annual_HOA_Fee__c + Annual_Managment_Fee__c + Vacancy_Repairs__c + Maintenance_Repairs__c + (IF( Verified_Annual_Insurance__c > 0, Verified_Annual_Insurance__c, Annual_Insurance__c )) + (IF( Verified_Tax__c > 0, Verified_Tax__c, Annual_Taxes__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If blank, complete all fields: Annual HOA Fee, Annual Insurance, Annual Management Fee, Annual Taxes, Vacancy Repairs/Maintenance, and Annual Maintenance/Repairs
CustomField.label: Annual Total Expenses
